entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Mingan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:09 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Longue-Pointe-de-Mingan 02:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
Temperature: -9.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -15.7°C
Wind: NNE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow or freezing rain. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets beginning near noon then changing to freezing rain in the afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Freezing rain or rain. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain after midnight. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
